coreAttributes.name: himation
coreAttributes.description: A large, rectangular piece of woollen cloth which is wrapped around the body and worn like a cloak. The excess fabric is then pulled up over the wearer's head to make a hood.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drape)] the cloak over [npc.her] shoulders, before tying the cord around [npc.her] neck.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(drape)] the cloak over [npc2.namePos] shoulders, before tying the cord around [npc2.her] neck.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(drape)] the cloak over [npc2.namePos] shoulders, before firmly tying the cord around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the cord around [npc.her] neck, before taking off [npc.her] cloak.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the cord around [npc2.namePos] neck, before taking off [npc2.her] cloak.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the cord around [npc2.namePos] neck, before pulling off [npc2.her] cloak.
